Key Match Events: Ismaïla Sarr scored the winning penalty for Senegal in the 71st minute
Pre-Game Insights: Senegal were desperate to bounce back after a surprising 1-1 draw at home to Burkina Faso
Burundi went into the fixture top of Group L after an impressive 3-2 away win against Malawi in their opener
Post-Match Reflections: Aliou Cisse, Senegal’s coach, praised his team’s resilience after coming back from a challenging position
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match took place at Bingu National Stadium in Lilongwe, Malawi
